How nice! I'll have to find a good place to keep it!
Does this mean you've been paying proper attention to my rumours?
I can't see how else you'd come up with such a good gift!
Thank you! I certainly appreciate the gesture!
Hmm... In future, please keep such things out of my tavern.
As much as I appreciate the thought, I can hardly leave this place for just anyone!
This is a surprise! You want an old man like me as your roomie?
I hope this means you're going to help out with the tavern too!
I can hardly leave the place completely unnattended!
I imagine you won't really see me around your home that much...
But this will be fun, eh?
I see. Did you need something in particular then?
